tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Value for money,
review:
At the outset let me express my sincere gratitude to Dr Pankaj for having guided me judiciously in my journey to lose weight, thereby improve liver function from grade2 to better situation. I followed Dr‚Äôs diet for 6 months n to my surprise all the parameters are satisfied on testing blood n urine at Amrita hospital Kochi.
I was a bit hesitant in d beginning, but the concerted efforts of dr. to see me in a healthier condition is indeed appreciated.
I thank my son for referring to Dr Pankaj who is a very dedicated  n sincere doctor. He was available at all points of time when I needed him and listened to my queries patiently.He boosted my morale so much so that he became a member of our family. The plan is cost effective as well.
If anyone plans to opt for a better health I would definitely suggest DrPankaj as the best person to approach due to his loving caring service. Wishing Dr all the best in future endeavours.üôèüôè

review:

I would surely recommend him if you are facing issues related to weight loss, weight gain, emotional eating, midnight snacking, high cholesterol or stress.

review: I have been facing problem of Gall bladder stones and pain was extremely severe. Dr. Pankaj Kumar explained everything in detail and suggest some modifications in my diet and routine. After following for a few days, you will encounter positive change in your body and glow on your face.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
I recently visited Diet Plus Minus in Dwarka and was extremely impressed with the service and expertise provided by Dr. Pankaj Kumar, who is a weight loss consultant. The clinic is clean, modern and well equipped.

Dr. Pankaj Kumar is extremely knowledgeable and took the time to understand my goals, dietary restrictions and medical history. He provided me with a personalized diet plan that was easy to follow and tailored to my needs. Dr. Pankaj Kumar also provided me with valuable education on healthy eating habits and lifestyle changes that will help me maintain my weight loss in the long term.

The staff at Diet Plus Minus are friendly and professional, and the clinic has a welcoming and comfortable atmosphere. I would highly recommend Dr. Pankaj Kumar and Diet Plus Minus to anyone looking to improve their health and nutrition.

Overall, my experience with Diet Plus Minus and Dr. Pankaj Kumar was positive and I would recommend the clinic to anyone looking for a professional and effective weight loss program.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review: I was initially diagnosed with the infection  on 13th April 2021. But my actual medicine started delayed by a week's time when the report came. Dr. Pankaj understood our current situation and advised medicine and precautions to be taken. By this period  all three of us  i.e. my wife, son & myself had got infected. My wife and son recovered in a week's time, but my fever was hovering around 99 to 100 degree. I was deeply concerned and slightly  worried also. Last month so many misinformation very floating  over the internet, social media. Somebody was telling me to get CT scan done, do multiple test of blood tests. One mantra he told me for Covid: not to get worried if O2 level is good  & fever is not a point of concern. In a couple of days my fever subsided under  his medication. Post 28th April 2021,  I recovered  and was under his watchful eyes post Covid treatment .** ** * **** **** ******* ****** ************** will ample loads of patience and friendliness.  I will strongly recommend Dr Pankaj to anybody in my relatives  or friend's / peer circles.  Thanks you doctor once again.
reply_text: Thank you so much Alok ji.

review: I am really impressed and pleased with the type of attention, the doctor paid to the issue, and the great desire that he showed for helping. It is certainly beyond the call of duty and very selfless effort. It is also important that he did not act in a patronising way, and he treated me as someone who can understand the underlying issues, and he recognises that I am a party to the process of healing. His practical tips beyond medicine, especially about food and lifestyle are very important. The discussion on the underlying physiology and treatment approaches was also very useful .

My weight loss journey has started with Dr pankaj and when i met him i was 140 kg and now my weight is 117. This is the result of just 2 months diet and light exercise. My aim is to get myself at 90 kg and be fit. Dr Pankaj is helping me with all the doubts i had in my mind about the diet and consequences of wrong diet. Thanks so much for his help.

tags: Doctor friendliness,
review:
I like doctors who have right work ethics! You know, who truly propagate the idea that "PREVENTION IS BETTER THAN CURE" than prescribing "n" varieties of tablets and antibiotics to make your immune system weak eventually!. Dr.Pankaj Kumar is one among them.
He, unlike many people who try to exploit you in some way or the other, especially in Old rajinder nagar, is an honest and very professional doctor. He explained the possible causes and preventive measures nicely. *** ********* *** ** *** ******
He took good 20-30mins to explain the root cause analysis he had done.
I'd definitely recommend this doctor to everyone I know. Not only to get a better medical advice, but also to show him as an example of how a person with good work ethics would look like in the very corrupt society that we live in!
Thank you Dr. Pankaj Kumar! Please keep up the good work!

Simply put- HE IS AMAZING.

tags: Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Doctor friendliness,
review: I was suffering from fever for last 28 days, I had consulted with two doctors prior to visiting Dr. Pankaj, but there was no significant improvement in my condition, earlier both the doctors had suggested veedal test for typhoid along with blood test, I was given antibiotics for few days along with one medicine for bacteria infection, but every thing went in vain. Then I searched for Dr Pankaj and visited his clinic He gave me ample time to understand the root cause, then suggested urine and blood culture test along with few other tests. There was problem with my urine and Dr. Pankaj suggested one injection for five days along with few tablets and one syrup, surprisingly I started feeling far better from day 2 only. He is one of the best doctors as per my personal experience . Thank you Dr. Pankaj

review: I went with my mother as she was suffering with throat infection and he gave prescription for gastric issues.i thought that he prescribed syrup for cough but actually it was for gas.
reply_text: As per her history and meticulous clinical examination she was suffering from Gastro esophageal reflux disease, so treated accordingly. As i remember she was suffering from dry cough with burning sensation and heaviness in chest since 2 months.  I was 3rd or 4th doctor, dealing your case and every doctor gave treatment for cough but she was not releived. So just think once before pointing finger to any doctor.. Moreover I adviced for evaluation of chest but lost follow up. Donot judge too early, everything takes time. Hope to see you again in my clinic... Thank you...
